scripts.bootstrap: rm -rf node_modules && npm cache clean --force && npm i --save-dev yarn && yarn && npm init -y && npm install -E zeppelin-solidity && if [ ! -f "config/secrets.json" ]; then touch config/secrets.json && echo '{}' > config/secrets.json; fi && npm i
scripts.test:prep: npm run lint && npm run ganache-cli:dev
scripts.test:js: npm run test:prep && truffle test --network rpc ./test/BasketToken.test.js
scripts.test:sol: npm run test:prep && truffle test --network rpc ./test/TestBasketToken.sol
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:e2eprep && npm run test:prep && TEST_ENV=e2e truffle test --network rpc ./test/E2E.test.js
scripts.test: npm run test:prep && npm run test:js && npm run test:sol
scripts.cover: npm run lint && npm run ganache-cli:coverage && ./node_modules/.bin/solidity-coverage
scripts.update-module: git submodule update --init && git submodule foreach git pull origin master
